_sText:
Kill the other team.

It's dark so you can:
Use flashlight.
Press buttons in corners to light up parts of the map.
Shoot at button in center of roof to light up entire map for 2 seconds(30 second cooldown).

There is water everywhere so you will see splashes when people run around.
You start with m4a1 and usp so you can use silencer to avoid being heard.

There is also some floor lamps that will light up when you walk on them(in a line accros the center of the map).

Figure out your own tactics :)

(updated fixed textures)
